jyzer
Class ClassFile

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.ClassFile

public final class ClassFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a classfile object. The definition of the classfile structure is:

ClassFile:

  • u4 magic
  • u2 minor_verion
  • u2 major_version
  • u2 constant_pool_count
  • cp_info constant_pool[constant_pool_count-1]
  • u2 access flags
  • u2 this class
  • u2 super class
  • u2 interfaces_count
  • u2 interfaces[interfaces_count]
  • u2 fields_count
  • field_info fields[fields_count]
  • u2 methods_count
  • methdo_info methods[methods_count]
  • u2 attributes_count
  • attribute_info attributes[attributes_count]

Version:
1.0, 2005.07.30
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver

ClassFile

public ClassFile(java.lang.String fileName)

Parameters:

ClassFile

public ClassFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                 javax.swing.JFrame owner)
Constructor, creates a new instance of ClassFile. The owner has to be known for the ProgressMonitorInputStream for processing the classfile.

Parameters:
fileName - the path of the classfile.
owner - a JFrame that uses the classfile.

parse

public void parse()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  ParsingException
The parsing of the classfile. Makes the requied tests, and notifies if not a classfile was opened, or if its version number is above the suggested maximum.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if problem occured with processing the file.
ParsingException - if the given file is not a real classfile.

getHTMLDescription

public java.lang.String getHTMLDescription()
Returns the description of the classfile as a html text. It is used to display on the Summary pane, that can be saved. Calls recursively the getHTMLDescription of the components.

Returns:
the description of the classfile in HTML.
